alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 12:10PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN UNION, ESSEX, EASTERN PASSAIC, AND SOUTHERN BERGEN COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM... At 1209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlesex, or near Plainfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plainfield around 1215 PM EDT. Summit around 1225 PM EDT. Millburn and Union around 1230 PM EDT. Orange and Caldwell around 1240 PM EDT. Bloomfield and Lyndhurst around 1245 PM EDT. Passaic and Rutherford around 1250 PM EDT. Paterson, Hawthorne and Teterboro around 1255 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mountainside, Montclair, Garfield, Ridgefield Park, Cedar Grove, Glen Ridge, Totowa, Lodi, Westfield and Saddle Brook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Essex; Western Union
